data.name: Cargoos
data.description: We created a website for Cargoos Logistics, a company from Chicago, USA. We developed a WordPress theme based on the provided graphic design and also designed plugins for the WordPress blog editor.

data.name: Coupon Dojo
data.description: A multilingual website offering vouchers and discount codes for online stores across 19 countries, with tens of thousands of coupons in the database. The portal also features a built-in blog system.

data.name: Twoja oferta
data.description: An extensive online classifieds portal based on the Notice3 advertisement script, highly efficient, supporting thousands of advertisements and users. It boasts a modern and responsive design.

data.name: Shop & Go
data.description: Shop & Go is a sales platform that makes it easy to find the best fashion offers in many stores at the same time. Built on Symfony.

data.name: Myroxylon
data.description: A multilingual website based on WordPress and a purchased theme, developed for the German company Myroxylon GmbH, specializing in creating value through alternative investment projects.

data.name: Multino
data.description: A modern website featuring advertisements based on the Notice 2 script, characterized by a contemporary design and extensive functionality. It includes a PWA application that functions similarly to a native mobile application.

data.name: Kamil Wyremski - portfolio
data.description: Portfolio of one of our developers, created in React. On their GitHub account, you can preview the source code of the project, which also includes a PWA application.

data.name: Hosting Dojo
data.description: A portal for comparing hosting speeds from different geographic locations, utilizing several Rest APIs to collect test results and display them to users in various charts.

data.name: Kody Rabatowe
data.description: A Polish website providing vouchers and discount codes for online stores, connected via API with many voucher providers. The database is optimized for high traffic and includes a built-in search engine.

data.name: Trafna Okazja
data.description: An extensive online classifieds portal based on the Notice3 advertisement script, targeted at customers in Poland, created based on the provided graphic design.

data.name: Gieldamam
data.description: A thematic classifieds portal for women, based on the Notice 2 announcement script, developed according to provided graphic design.

data.name: Przystań Foundation
data.description: We created the website for the Przystań Foundation, based on Symfony, featuring its own administration panel. We also handled the graphic design for both the backend and frontend.

data.name: MotoBryki
data.description: A website featuring automotive announcements and industry-related articles, based on our Notice2 script, developed according to a design provided by a graphic designer.

data.name: Kamil Wyremski - blog
data.description: A developer blog running on WordPress, featuring entries on various programming topics, descriptions of scripts from our offer, and ready-made modules for websites.

data.name: Mateusz Rzetecki - porfolio
data.description: The portfolio of an SEO expert, featuring an individual custom backend and a blog. Developed based on the provided graphic design.

data.name: Strefa.co.uk
data.description: One of the first advertising portals for Poles living in Great Britain, based on the Notice script. It serves hundreds of users daily and contains tens of thousands of ads in its database.

data.name: MaxPlus Kalisz
data.description: The website of a multi-branch company from Poland, providing accounting and printing services (advertising agency). We created both the graphic design and the website itself, including the administration panel.

data.name: Bioskin Kalisz
data.description: The website of a professional beauty and hairdressing salon, known for its fast loading and included PWA application. The backend is based on the Symfony framework.

data.name: Patrycja Wyremska - portfolio
data.description: The portfolio of one of our developers, specializing in creating websites on WordPress and PrestaShop, as well as in SEO and writing texts and articles for websites.

data.name: PressFoto
data.description: A database of press photos for photojournalists and publishers, based on the Cuadro script. It offers two types of accounts with varying functionality. We designed both the graphic interface and the website itself.

data.name: Ogoloshennya
data.description: A trilingual website with online advertisements (in Polish, Russian, and Ukrainian), based on the Notice script. Ads can be added in one of three languages or all at once.

data.name: Swiat Kamienia
data.description: A simple website for a company involved in the composition of natural stone. We designed the appearance and created both the backend with the administration panel and the frontend of the website.

data.name: Chicago Advertisements
data.description: One of the largest advertising portals for Poles living in Chicago, USA, based on our Notice script. It sees the addition of dozens of new ads every day and serves hundreds of users.

data.name: Oglaszamy 24h
data.description: A website for free classified ads in various categories, based on the advertisement script Notice and created using a graphic design.

data.name: Flats in Style
data.description: A real estate classifieds site, based on a dedicated script for announcements and created using a graphic design.

data.name: Picnic Event
data.description: A website for a company specializing in events, company picnics, conferences, trainings, promotions, and other services, built on Wordpress.

data.name: Odnova Clinic
data.description: The website for a salon providing massages and treatments for the face and body, built on Wordpress using a ready-made theme.
